thread.title: ICC prosecutor seeks approval to open full-scale investigation into 2008 conflict in Georgia
thread.title_full: ICC prosecutor seeks approval to open full-scale investigation into 2008 conflict in Georgia

title: ICC prosecutor seeks approval to open full-scale investigation into 2008 conflict in Georgia
text:
Published By: Fox News: World - Today 
The International Criminal Court's prosecutor has requested permission to open an investigation into the 2008 war between Georgia and Russia...
